import React from 'react'; import { FaFlask, FaCogs, FaThermometerHalf, FaExclamationTriangle } from 'react-icons/fa'; const ReactorPage = () => { const reactorTypes = [ { icon: , title: "Batch Reactors", description: "Ideal for small-scale production and specialty chemicals with excellent control over reaction conditions." }, { icon: , title: "Continuous Reactors", description: "Perfect for large-scale production with steady-state operation and consistent product quality." }, { icon: , title: "Temperature Control", description: "Advanced heat management systems ensuring optimal reaction temperatures and safety." } ]; return (
{/* Page Header */}

Chemical Reactor Design & Engineering

Advanced reactor design and optimization services for New Zealand's chemical processing industries, ensuring efficient conversion of raw materials into valuable products while maintaining the highest safety and environmental standards.

{/* Reactor Overview */}

Reactor Engineering Excellence

Chemical reactors are the heart of any process plant, where raw materials undergo transformation into valuable products. Our expertise in reactor design ensures optimal performance, safety, and efficiency for New Zealand's diverse chemical processing needs.

From small-scale batch operations for specialty chemicals to large continuous processes for commodity production, we provide comprehensive reactor engineering solutions tailored to your specific requirements and regulatory compliance needs.

Key Design Considerations

  • • Reaction kinetics and thermodynamics
  • • Heat and mass transfer optimization
  • • Safety and hazard analysis
  • • Environmental impact minimization
  • • Economic optimization
  • • Regulatory compliance
{/* Reactor Types */}

Reactor Types & Applications

Comprehensive reactor solutions for diverse industrial applications

{reactorTypes.map((reactor, index) => (
{reactor.icon}

{reactor.title}

{reactor.description}

))}
{/* Applications */}

Industry Applications

Chemical Manufacturing

Design and optimization of reactors for pharmaceutical, petrochemical, and specialty chemical production.

  • • Pharmaceutical synthesis
  • • Petrochemical processing
  • • Polymer production
  • • Fine chemicals

Food & Biotechnology

Specialized reactor systems for food processing, fermentation, and biotechnology applications.

  • • Fermentation processes
  • • Food processing
  • • Enzyme production
  • • Biofuel production
{/* Safety Notice */}

Safety First

All reactor designs include comprehensive safety analysis, hazard identification, and risk mitigation strategies to ensure safe operation and regulatory compliance.

); }; export default ReactorPage;
